items.content_html: A web application to discover new books, write reviews, and create customized book lists. ReactJS for UI, NodeJS Express API for a simple lightweight backend, and PostgreSQL for database.

items.content_html: FlasKit is a lightweight and easy-to-use starter kit for building Flask applications. It includes all the necessary tools and resources for getting started with Flask, including a starter template in Flask, AlbineJS, HTMX, and Pydantic.

items.content_html: TaskHub - Simple To-Do List Website (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript). TaskHub is a straightforward and lightweight to-do list website developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project focuses on providing users with a minimalistic yet efficient platform to manage their tasks and enhance productivity.
items.title: prince-1908/TaskHub: TaskHub - Simple To-Do List Website (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript).  TaskHub is a straightforward and lightweight to-do list website developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project focuses on providing users with a minimalistic yet efficient platform to manage their tasks and enhance productivity.
